title: League not downloading
body: I tried to download league on my laptop ive downloaded it on many other platforms but on this one when i launch the launcher after it opens it loads 1% every 5-10 mins even thought my connection in 30mbps and then at about 30-40% it says an unspecified error occured???

replies.body: If you're getting past ~30% or so before the error occurs, this generally means there was some sort of error in the connection between your network and our patching servers.  Go ahead and run through our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article which has fixes to the most common causes of connection issues that we see. Let me know if it helps!
